text: 2014–15 Hong Kong Senior Challenge Shield is the 113th season of one of the Asian oldest football knockout competitions, Hong Kong Senior Challenge Shield. Only 9 teams enter this edition, with one game being played in Round 1 before the Quarter Final stage. The competition is only open to teams that play in the Hong Kong Premier League. ==Calendar== {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! Stage ! Round !
